【Small washing machine】 is recommended to wash: socks, underwear, diapers, swimsuits, single T-shirts and other small pieces of clothing. 【 It's not suggest to 】wash below kinds of clothes: jeans, long skirts, bathrobes and other large clothing.

【SAFE AND ENERGY SAVING】Portable washer machine using TPE and food grade silicone material is a great choice for your personal items, baby items, patients' families! The washing machine only needs 0.01 kWh of electricity for 1 hour, which can save you more time, money, energy and trouble. Improve your quality of life.
【FOLDING DESIGN】Mini Portable Washing Machine bucket design,easy to store when not in use. Easily fits under a stool or bed without taking up too much space in your home.
【Easy to operate】Compact simple washing machine has a semi-automatic cleaning function and is equipped with a 10-minute timer knob, which resets automatically when finished.

【1 Year Worry-Free Replacement】Our priority is your satisfaction. If you are not satisfied with the small washing machine, please feel free to let us know and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still works well
reviews.reviewText: Honestly this thing is hilarious and pretty great. I use it for my bras and underwear, and an occasional fragile shirt.Pros:1. Cleans well2. Stays on the counter3. Collapsible4. Does not damage my delicate lace itemsCons:1. It's loud, but I think it's funny. Others might be put off by it2. The button doesn't work and half the time I have no idea what time it's going to set for because I have to press the button repeatedly just to get it to start3. It drains into a compartment underneath the spinner that you can't access so I'm always worried it's dirty or moldy in there. There's no way to clean that area or make sure it's dry when being stored. I usually rinse the whole thing with white vinegar and let it drain through and hope for the best.Really though, it's lasted a lot longer than I thought it would and has helped my delicates stay pretty pristine. It cleans them a lot more thoroughly than hand washing ever did and saves me a lot of hassle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve liked this portable washer so far, and I’ve had it for a little over a month with 2 loads run through. The first time I used it I just did socks and a bra, the second time I’ve used it for a swimsuit and socks.Here’s what I like:- it’s quick! I usually do 2-3 ten minute loads with the last load as a rinse with just warm water- it’s small. Great for folding up and taking on the go (though I haven’t yet- I do plan to!)- gets things clean! Obviously that’s the point of a washer, so it does get your clothes clean- the water does come out dirty.Here’s what I don’t like:- after a load, the dirt/dirty water doesn’t get completely out. It makes me feel kind of icky that it just sits there and cleaning it is a pain. I just turn it upside down & do a rinse cycle with nothing in it.- because it takes a couple of ten minute loads to get things clean (depending on how dirty something was), I wouldn’t recommend it for camping or somewhere where you have limited resources- I don’t really think the soap gets all the way out. I rinse through with warm water because of this and do a ten minute cycle of just water to rectify that. Even then, I did notice the first time my socks air dried they were board stiff, so I’d keep that in mind.Bottom line:I’d get this again, and I quite like it. I got it to wash reusable pads, and I think it’ll work just fine for that when I need it. Also, if anyone’s confused like I was- you swipe to get to the 10 or 2 minute cycle- not press. It’s a neat little thing and it works like it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small washing machine because I was tired of handwashing!Found this and it does the job.Pros:- Foldable/compact, I can store it away easily- Easy to pull out to its full size (Was afraid it would be difficult but it is not. I was also afraid it would be weak but the structure is sturdy)- Timer button options are simple and easy to understand- Different time options which is useful for different load sizes or a rinsing option- The spout at the bottom for easy drainage!- Suction cup bottom to keep in placeCons:- You do hear it when it is running- Lid is just a top cover does not lock or secure- I do wish there was some kind of cover for where you plug in the cord to avoid water going in when filling it up.The cons I am fine with especially at this price point. Overall I am enjoying this washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this machine and it is really useful.Its compact size is perfect for small living spaces, making it an ideal solution for apartments, RVs, or small homes. It doesn't take up much room and can easily be stored when not in use.Despite its small size, this machine delivers impressive cleaning results. It effectively tackles stains and odors, leaving clothes fresh and ready to wear.The user interface is intuitive and easy to navigate, making the washing process a hassle-free experience. Anyone can quickly learn how to operate it without any technical expertise.Whether it's everyday clothing, delicate fabrics, or even small blankets, this machine handles various types of laundry effectively. It's a versatile solution for a range of washing needs.Its lightweight design and portability make it an excellent option for those who frequently travel or for outdoor activities like camping and road trips. It's a convenient laundry solution on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works I guess
reviews.reviewText: You should really only be buying this if you’re washing one clothing at a time. The product functions fine but just don’t put multiple heavy clothings into the machine or else it will stop by itself. I would recommend if used to wash 1 - 2 even pairs of underwear and socks and 1 shirt at a time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mini washing machine is compact, just about paper size 8.5x 11, does not take up much space, and can be folded. It is very good for washing underwear, socks and socks. Personally, I feel that it is very easy to use. Although the machine is small, it has enough horsepower. You don’t need to put too much laundry detergent when washing, just a little is enough. The washing machine itself has a sterilizing function, which saves water. The sound of washing and dehydration is not loud. It is much more perfect than I imagined

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable washing Machine
reviews.reviewText: I love using it for my t-shirts, underwear, socks, swimsuit, and gym cloth. The food-grade silicone material gives me peace of mind, knowing my little one's clothes are being washed gently and safely. The simple timer knob and semi-automatic cleaning function make it easy to operate, even for someone like me who's not the most tech-savvy.While it's not suitable for larger items like jeans or bathrobes, the Mini Washing Machine has become my go-to for daily laundry needs. It saves me time, energy, and space, and its portability makes it perfect for taking along on camping trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No worth it to buy
reviews.reviewText: Juts wash but dont squeeze the clothes also I bought i probably used 3 times and now it not working , i wont rebuying again.
